channel.title: The [Server Help Post]
channel.description: Okay its hard to help you guys with so many posts for help so this is what we can do if you need help with anything server specific post here and we will try to help you [b]However:[/b] We do not simply just tell you exactly how to do everything for you part of it is a learning process! anyone is welcome to help other people here

item.title: The [Server Help Post]
item.dc:creator: @gander gander
item.description:
@gander wrote:

[quote="-fedexer-, post:13, topic:1251"]miss silabsoft i dont have a clue how to add them to the autospawn.cfg that is why im asking for a tut because i always get told “add them to the autospawn”

youve either added an extra “}” or you need another “}” in the server

buy how !!! if you dont have any idea on how it should be laid out !!!

please make a tut for people like me ? or explain in depth?

also i got this error today when compiling and running

client.java:916: illegal start of type if(command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5){ ^ client.java:947: <identifier> expected } ^ client.java:949: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) ^ client.java:2669: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1; ^ client.java:2670: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean process() ^ client.java:5231: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean ResetPlayerVars() ^ client.java:5488: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846, 4846, 4832, 4817, 4817}; ^ client.java:5496: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253, 3105, 2681, 2591}; ^ client.java:5497: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401, 9571, 3325, 3086}; ^ client.java:5504: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) ^ client.java:6641: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:6643: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void pmstatus(int status) ^ client.java:9891: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:9892: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ NPCHandler.java:387: illegal start of expression public static void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:461: illegal start of expression public static void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPC ID) ^ NPCHandler.java:777: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap2[][] = {{ ^ NPCHandler.java:793: illegal start of expression public static boolean AttackPlayer(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:1184: ';' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1185: '}' expected ^ 20 errors Press any key to continue . . .

could you please help ?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: The [Server Help Post]
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

miss silabsoft i dont have a clue how to add them to the autospawn.cfg that is why im asking for a tut because i always get told “add them to the autospawn”

buy how !!! if you dont have any idea on how it should be laid out !!!

please make a tut for people like me ? or explain in depth?

also i got this error today when compiling and running

client.java:916: illegal start of type if(command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5){ ^ client.java:947: <identifier> expected } ^ client.java:949: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) ^ client.java:2669: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int packetSize = 0, packetType = -1; ^ client.java:2670: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean process() ^ client.java:5231: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean ResetPlayerVars() ^ client.java:5488: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineY[] = {4846, 4846, 4832, 4817, 4817}; ^ client.java:5496: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineRX[] = {3253, 3105, 2681, 2591}; ^ client.java:5497: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int EssenceMineRY[] = {3401, 9571, 3325, 3086}; ^ client.java:5504: 'class' or 'interface' expected public boolean stairs(int stairs, int teleX, int teleY) ^ client.java:6641: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int Publicchat = 0; ^ client.java:6643: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void pmstatus(int status) ^ client.java:9891: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ client.java:9892: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ NPCHandler.java:387: illegal start of expression public static void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:461: illegal start of expression public static void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPC ID) ^ NPCHandler.java:777: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap2[][] = {{ ^ NPCHandler.java:793: illegal start of expression public static boolean AttackPlayer(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:1184: ';' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1185: '}' expected ^ 20 errors Press any key to continue . . .

could you please help ?

Read full topic

item.description:

look up a post

only the admin works which is me !

item.title: The [Server Help Post]
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

If you are behind a router you need to forward the ports the server runs on

For more information visit: http://portforward.com/

Read full topic

item.title: The [Server Help Post]
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

i have hybridscape and i am trying to get other users working but it just says already logged in??
how do i get it so they can log in?
i have them added in the characters file?

only the admin works which is me !

also my server doesnt work on any other computer including another computer i have in my house !

makes sure you got no capital letters in the names and also are you behind a routeR?
(from other thread)

yes im behind a router , and yes the names are fine but they dont work only my admin works !
please help?

Read full topic
